instruction: My friend just got a new jobs. I am happy for him, but also it pays a lot more than mine even though he is less qualified.
output: That's great! Where are they working?

instruction: I got lost in an unfamiliar city and had to rely on someone I didn't know,to give me directions.
output: That is scary! Hope you did not find yourself in the bad part of town

instruction: My teenager son almost got kicked out of school when he was 16, for getting caught with tobacco. It was his 5th offense
output: Oh wow! That is intense! I am glad he didn't get kicked out!

instruction: My future father in law is awesome at making sure I have everything I need and I try to do the same.
output: That is amazing. Sounds like you have a really good support system.

instruction: I found my grandfathers old watch he used to wear all the time. It really reminds me of him a lot.
output: That is pretty neat especially if it gives you good memories!

instruction: I'm excited for fall to start, I love layering my clothes
output: I do too. I wish we could have fall weather longer.

instruction: My birthday was last week and I thought everyone forgot about me. When I got home, all my friends and family were waiting. They had planned a party behind my back.
output: Oh what happened instead? Did your friends throw you a party?

instruction: I finally have a job and paid off my student loans.
output: That is awesome! I cannot wait until my student loans are paid off!

instruction: I have this feeling because I am applying to graduate school and I am anxious.
output: Oh, don't be! Just have faith in yourself and be confident that you can make it in.

instruction: I really want a Chanel bag for Christmas, my friend got one and it's so beautiful.
output: They do have nice bags! I hope you are able to get one!

instruction: My son is turning 2 in a few months and it has me feeling this way.
output: Nice! How are you celebrating for him?

instruction: I'm going to eat sushi for the first time this weekend, but I am a little nervous.
output: Yum! Sushi is so good, I'm sure you'll enjoy it! I like the eel roll and spicy tuna roll.

instruction: We're going roller coaster riding this weekend
output: Where are you going? I would say if your gut is telling you that it is not good then I would suggest listening to it

instruction: My husband and I went out to a real nice restaurant for our anniversary and i looked down just as I was fixing t take a bite out of my lobster and there was a nice long piece of hair
output: A "really nice" piece of hair?  Yikes.  Did you send it back?

instruction: Football season is about to start. I used to always watch the opening day games with my dad. I'm halfway across the country now though, and we won't be able to do it in person for a long time. Makes me miss him
output: Oh dang, that is too bad.  Can you guys video call?

instruction: Anytime I am laying in bed watching TV and playing on my phone I am perfectly happy with life especially if my fiance is home.
output: I'm right there with you. I've always been a home-body. I don't like going out as much. Sometimes people say millennials and technology have disconnected people too much.. that could be true. But at least we're comfortable doin it.

instruction: My 5 year old son is already reading! He picked up on it so fast!
output: That is awesome, I was an early reader as well! That is a great accomplishment!!

instruction: I didn't get the promotion at work that I had been working so hard for.
output: Oh no! I'm so sorry!  Are you able to be up for another one soon?

instruction: I farted infront of a lady in the train.
output: It happens to the best of us! I know the lady understands!

instruction: I didn't get the promotion at work that I worked so hard to get.
output: Sorry to hear that, I know that you probably feel disappointed but there will be other opportunities!

instruction: I dont like uncertainty. I like to know what is going to happen.
output: Do you have some uncertainty in you life right now?

instruction: I have been alone for almost 5 years now.
output: As in living alone or single?

instruction: Was walking down the street yesterday and some little twerp ran his skateboard right into me, and he slammed into the back of my knee. It's been throbbing all day and it's swollen. Pretty sure something's messed up. I'm ready for bad news. At least I have insurance now.
output: Oh wow, I'm sorry to hear that! Put your leg up and relax this weekend!

instruction: My current employer is having big financials problem. I am afraid that the company will go into bankruptcy.
output: That sounds really frustrating to deal with. You sound like you're self-aware and anticipating the problem, though. Perhaps you've already started preparing to look elsewhere?

instruction: First time in a long time I've gotten a haircut that I'm satisfied with. For once my big head doesn't look so big. I actually don't feel too stupid looking!
output: Nice. Did you find a good hairdresser?

instruction: My dog is sick so i took him to the vet now we are waiting for the results of his bloodwork
output: I am sorry to hear that! My dog is a part of the family, so I understand. I hope everything is okay.

instruction: I felt this way while caring for patients at my previous job.
output: what did you do?

instruction: I am excited about going on vacation.
output: That's great. Where are you going?

instruction: My daughter is pregnant with her first child. I am optimistic it will be a smooth pregnancy. I am sure it will all work out.
output: That is exciting. When is she due?

instruction: I find myself with being over ran with anxiety that it is hard to concentrate and stay focused
output: I totally understand.  Life can sometimes seem overwhelming.  I have learned to stop, take a deep breath, and do one thing at a time.

instruction: My friends just recently purchased a new 2019 Honda Civic.  I am truly angry; I shouldn't be, but I am.  I should be the one with the new car.
output: Yikes! Bet the car payment is not worth it. lol

instruction: I had stolen a few candies from the jar in the store. I had to tell my mom after.
output: Woah, hope she doesn't report you! Jk

instruction: I feel this way because I have hope that I will get into grad school.
output: What are you applying for?

instruction: I won the MVP award at a hockey tournament. I had 8 goals.
output: What game and what kind of award>

instruction: I just bought my first house.  I get to move in next week.
output: Oh wow that is so exciting! I'm sure you are excited to move in.

instruction: I am feeling this way right now with my life. I am so thankful and happy.
output: You sound very content. What makes you happy?

instruction: I saw a creepy looking clown peering at me through the window. I almost jumped out of my skin. I ran into my basement and hid in a closet.
output: Oh no, I would have had a heart attack.

instruction: my boyfriend dragged me to a haunted house and it was to much for me
output: Nice, how was it?

instruction: I make the good fluffy cheesecake. But sometimes it's hard because the egg whites have to be perfectly beaten.
output: Are you doing the cheesecake for your family?

instruction: I love so much my wife. She has been so caring and kind with me.
output: That's really nice! You should show her you appreciate her. Maybe cook her dinner!

instruction: I dislike when I have to get up in the middle of a training session when the whole class is filled, my face gets all red and blotchy.
output: Ugh that must so inconvenient and uncomfortable!

instruction: My friend got tickets to the Superbowl and not me.
output: Oh gosh, is he going to take you to the Superbowl at least?

instruction: I went to Disney with my family is was great!
output: Nice! I want to take my daughter when she is older. Did you go to Disneyland or world?

instruction: My mom gave me an old photo album the other day. It really brought back the memories.
output: aww that is great!

instruction: I was in the break room and took two donuts when i was only allowed one
output: Oh naughty. Did anyone see you?

instruction: I am ready for vacation!
output: Are you making a trip to see your family?

instruction: I recently found that I was adopted. I felt terrible bad.
output: That would definitely be a difficult thing to find out. How did you find out?

instruction: I lost my swim bottoms at the water park.
output: Haha.. I feel like that's almost a rite of passage when going to water parks. I've had that happen, too. Hopefully it wasn't too traumatic for you. I almost lost my glasses once, too! Now that was really scary

instruction: My apartment complex is nickel and diming me and counting off so many things wrong with the apartment to detract from my security deposit as I get set to leave after this month. I know people said to expect to never see your security deposit again, but this is ridiculous! I feel like the apartment is pretty much exactly the same!
output: I hate when that happens! The same thing happened to me when I moved out of my apartment. They kept my security deposit because they needed to replace carpet.

instruction: My boss informed me that I am in pole position of getting the promotion.
output: That's pretty awesome, congrats

instruction: If there's one thing I learned it's to trust my own judgment and mine alone.  Forget what the haters say and just keep grinding toward my goals
output: Good on you. You need to be comfortable in your own skin and its not other people's business to tell you how to live.

instruction: I was in bed and i heard a loud noise in my kitchen. but i was home alone!
output: Did you get up to check it out?

instruction: I have an overseas trip coming up. I have never been and I am feeling a little scared right now about going.
output: that is exciting@

instruction: I was watching professional rodeo the other day. It is amazing how those cowboys can stay on the bulls so long. It looks so hard to do.
output: That is an amazing talent to have. I would be so scared!

instruction: I am waiting to see if I pass my graduate exam and I am feeling this way.
output: I hope you did it. Don't worry too much.

instruction: My house burned down and I had to rescue my family, It was a chilly night.
output: What happened? Hope you are okay?

instruction: I found some pictures of my grandma in the attic last night
output: Did you find anything great?

instruction: I woke up this morning to my wife telling me she was pregnant!
output: Oh hey that's awesome!  That is awesome right?
